mapper.select: SELECT account.account.account_id AS ACCOUNT_ID, account.account.login_id AS LOGIN_ID, account.account.password AS PASSWORD, account.profile.sex_type AS SEX_TYPE, account.profile.birthday AS BIRTHDAY FROM account.account INNER JOIN account.profile ON account.account.account_id = account.profile.account_id WHERE account.account.login_id = #{login_id}
